data.why:
FullAuto is a suite of perl modules for doing SECURE network
    process automation. As such, it is a first of its kind
    "network-process-automation-utility" (to coin a phrase). It's an
    experimental implementation of *that* "the network is the computer"
    *thing*. FullAuto uses SSH,SFTP,TELNET and FTP to combine command
    line environments on multiple computers into one GRAND COMMAND LINE
    where complex network-wide processes can be automated in ONE script
    - on ONE computer. FullAuto is a paradigm shift in computing in that
    it successfully implements true CLIENT-LESS computing (coining yet
    another phrase).
